metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1770 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Support bundle generated files could contain sensitive information thatmight be unwanted to be disclosed. This issue affects: ((OTRS)) CommunityEdition: 5.0.41 and prior versions, 6.0.26 and prior versions. OTRS: 7.0.15and prior versions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-1770` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.27-1
otrs2 - 6.0.27-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.27-1').
